subject: Good Day, How are you?
mailbody:
Good Day,
How are you? I will like to have a little discussion with you if you don't mind because I am so happy to come across your contact today.
  
Thanks and have a lovely day,
  
Yours Sincerely.
Ms. Anna. M

subject: Re: Good Day, How are you?
mailbody:
Hello,
Can you give me some more info about what you're offering? Specifically, how does it apply to our business? How can we use this?

Matthew Jackson
CEO, MNesty, LLC
